description:
AJKB-10 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Peshwas: Chiffon Trouser: Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Maroon

Cloaked in the regal hue of dark maroon, this ensemble is a masterpiece of intricate artistry. The embroidered Peshwas, a celestial canvas, is adorned with delicate light gold zariwork that gracefully winds through a constellation of shimmering 3mm cupped sequins, amidst an interconnected web of threads in maroon and peach hues. The embroidered dupatta, a celestial veil, completes this gorgeous ensemble, transforming the wearer into a vision of beauty.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front & back bodice on chiffon
Embroidered front neckline on chiffon
Embroidered back neckline on chiffon
1.25 meter embroidered border for bodice hem on chiffon
14 embroidered Kalis for peshwas on chiffon
4.5 meter embroidered border for ghera on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta with 4-side border on chiffon
1.5 meter wide-width silk for trouser
